definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Our opposable thumbs, as we call them, allow us to work with our fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我們的對生拇指，使得我們可以使用手指工作。

sentences.english: Improvements will be made, and you will have a more positive outlook on life in general.
sentences.chinese: 本會有釐正，將對生在總體上有更主動的見解。

sentences.english: The teaching system of biochemical experiment in the majors concerning biology was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對生物類專業生物化學實驗教學體系進行了研究。

sentences.english: Apes and monkeys also have opposable thumbs on their feet that help their dexterity.
sentences.chinese: 類人猿和猴子腳部也有增加其靈敏性的對生拇指。

sentences.english: The young herdsman briskly mounted a horse that was inclined to act up with an unaccustomed rider.
sentences.chinese: 年輕牧民輕快地躍上一匹慣於對生人使性子的馬。

sentences.english: Leaves opposite, small, simple to deeply 3-lobed and almost palmate, usually early deciduous.
sentences.chinese: 葉對生，小，單的到3深裂和幾乎掌狀，通常早落葉。

sentences.english: Inflorescence a corymbose cyme , leaf-opposed or pseudo terminal, often at tips of tendrils.
sentences.chinese: 花序傘房狀聚傘花序，對生或，通常在頂部的卷鬚。

sentences.english: The high-stand swamp organic facies just appears in the edge of the basin, and its hydrocarbon generation capacity is the lowest.
sentences.chinese: 高位沼澤有機相由於處於盆地邊緣，對生烴貢獻不大。

sentences.english: The relationship between germ cell and sertoli cell is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並對生精細胞和支持細胞的關係進行了討論。

sentences.english: What are your thoughts on raw foods?
Her interest in biochemistry has been growing since Form 4 when she took biology.
sentences.chinese: 李宇明自中四上生物課時已開始對生化學感興趣。

sentences.english: Opposable thumbs also allow us to grab and pick up things.
sentences.chinese: 對生拇指還能夠完成抓取和撿起的動作。

sentences.english: The effects of ultrasound on raw skins were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超聲波對生皮的作用。

sentences.english: The dog bared its gums at the stranger.
sentences.chinese: 那條狗對生人齔牙咧嘴。

definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
(abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
